resources.string:
"By selecting this option, if 

A) The music is playing: Next music gets played. 

B) The music is paused: The music player goes back to the previous Music. "
"By selecting this option whether the music is playing or not, the music player skips to next music. "
"By selecting this option whether the music is playing or not, the music player backs to previous music. "

"By selecting this option, if 

A) The music is playing: The volume of music player increases. 

B) The music is paused: The volume of music player reduces. "
"By selecting this option whether the music is playing or not, the volume of music player increases. "
"By selecting this option whether the music is playing or not, the volume of music player reduces. "
"To activate app actions, connect your earphone to mobile and double tap on left earphone touch area. After double tap, the following dialog will be shown: "
"Check \"Remember my choice\" and select \"EARPHONE\" app. \nNow you can use your selected custom action on left earphone double tap. "
